Since the invention is intended to provide as σ<sub>1</sub>A compound of a receptor ligand or a chemically related series of compounds, therefore if the compound has binding expressed as Ki (it is preferred that<1000nM, more preferably<500nM, even more preferred is<100nM), it is a very preferred embodiment.
